attributes.action: Sack Damien Green for sexually harassment and improper use of  parliamentary PC.
attributes.background:
He’s accused of making inappropriate sexual advances to an academic and Tory activist 30 years his junior.

And two retired Met police detectives claimed to have found ‘thousands’ of extreme pornographic images on a computer seized from his office raid.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs and/or Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.
